value.name: PA children are dying from drug overdoses, drownings and, most prevalent, physical abuse
value.description: Of 97 child fatality reports in Pennsylvania filed in two years, half of the families had been seen by a child welfare agency before the child died.

value.name: Three arrested in relation to stabbing death
value.description: Three men have been arrested in connection with the stabbing death reported in the 3700 block of Sanders Avenue, Laredo police said on Tuesday. Authorities identified the suspects as David Gonzalez, 21;

value.name: Three men arrested in connection to fourth murder of the year
value.description: Three men wanted by police for their alleged roles in the city’s fourth murder are finally caught.David Gonzalez, Jose Antonio Gonzalez, and Leobardo Gonzalez- who are all in their early twenties- were arrested on Tuesday and charged with murder.

value.name: Car, phone, shopping bag stolen
value.description: A man allowed by a friend to use her car allegedly left with it and hasn't returned, Shelbyville police said. The silver 2007 Dodge Magnum was last seen at a Union Street market early Tuesday. It has been reported as stolen.

value.name: Protests across Colombia intensify; demonstrators killed during clashes with police
value.description: Deadly anti-government protests are intensifying in Colombia as they enter a third week. CBSN's Tanya Rivero spoke with Reuters' Colombia correspondent Oliver Griffin about demonstrators' demands and how government leaders are responding. TANYA RIVERO ...
